Constraint.name: ContextKeyConstraint1

Constraint.name: ContextKeyConstraint2

Constraint.errorMSG: The referenced Simple has to be declared with the parameter protection='User' or 'Free' or 'External'

Constraint.name: ContextKeyConstraint5
Constraint.errorMSG: The Core Type of the Type where the declaration is made is either 'PLMConnection' or 'PLMPort'
Constraint.errorMsg: The Core Type of the Type where the declaration is made is either "PLMConnection" or "PLMPort"

Constraint.name: IdentifierSetConstraint1
Constraint.errorMSG: An Identifier Set can only be declared inside a Type with the Core Type 'PLMCoreReference' or 'PLMCoreRepReference'
Constraint.errorMsg: An Identifier Set can only be declared inside a Type with the Core Type "PLMCoreReference" or "PLMCoreRepReference"

Constraint.name: IdentifierSetConstraint2
Constraint.errorMSG: Among all the Simples referenced by an Identifier Set, at least one of them should be declared with the parameter Type='String'
Constraint.errorMsg: Among all the Simples referenced by an Identifier Set, at least one of them should be declared with the parameter Type='String'

Constraint.name: IdentifierSetConstraint3
Constraint.errorMSG: All the Simples referenced by an Identifier Set should be declared with the parameter Protection='External','ExternalR0' or 'Free'.
Constraint.errorMsg: All the Simples referenced by an Identifier Set should be declared with the parameter Protection='External','ExternalR0' or 'Free'.

Constraint.name: IdentifierSetConstraint4
Constraint.errorMSG: The referenced Simples have to belong to a Type (alias class) that is an ancestor of the Type of this Identifier Set
Constraint.errorMsg: The referenced Simples have to belong to a Type (alias class) that is an ancestor of the Type of this Identifier Set

Constraint.name: IdentifierSetConstraint5
Constraint.errorMSG: All the Simples referenced by an Identifier Set should be declared with the parameter CAAExposition='LO'.
Constraint.errorMsg: All the Simples referenced by an Identifier Set should be declared with the parameter CAAExposition='LO'.

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint2
Constraint.errorMSG: A Type declared in a 'Core' or 'Abstract' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Core' or ModelerType='Abstract') is always declared with the parameters Abstract='Yes'
Constraint.errorMsg: A Type declared in a 'Core' or 'Abstract' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Core' or ModelerType='Abstract') is always declared with the parameters Abstract='Yes'

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint3

Constraint.errorMsg: A Type declared in a 'Custo' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') is always declared with the parameter Abstract='No'

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint4
Constraint.errorMSG: Only a Type declared in a 'Top' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Top') can be declared with the parameter CAADerivable='Yes'
Constraint.errorMsg: Only a Type declared in a 'Top' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Top') can be declared with the parameter CAADerivable='Yes'

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint6
Constraint.errorMSG: A Type can only inherit from a Type declared with the parameter CAADerivable='Yes' if it has been declared inside a Custo Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo')
Constraint.errorMsg: A Type can only inherit from a Type declared with the parameter CAADerivable='Yes' if it has been declared inside a Custo Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo')

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint7

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint8
Constraint.errorMSG: A Type which is not declared in a Core modeler can only inherit from a Type of a modeler which is a Super Modeler of the modeler of the first Type
Constraint.errorMsg: A Type which is not declared in a Core modeler can only inherit from a Type of a modeler which is a Super Modeler of the modeler of the first Type

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint9
Constraint.errorMSG: A Type declared in a 'Custo' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') is always inheriting from a Type declared with the parameter CAADerivable='Yes'
Constraint.errorMsg: A Type declared in a 'Custo' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') is always inheriting from a Type declared with the parameter CAADerivable='Yes'

Constraint.name: ClassConstraint11

Constraint.name: PackageConstraint1
Constraint.errorMSG: A Custo Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') should inherit from a single Top Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Top')
Constraint.errorMsg: A Custo Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') should declared in a 'Custo' Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') is always inherit from a single Top Modeler (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Top')

Constraint.name: PackageConstraint2
Constraint.errorMSG: A Custo Modeler declaration (Modeler declared with the parameter ModelerType='Custo') should contain the declaration of an inheriting Type for every Customizable Types of the Super Modeler

Constraint.name: PackageConstraint3

Constraint.name: EnumConstraint1
Constraint.errorMSG: When an Enum is declared, the values (parameter 'Value') of the Enumerators declared in it should be unique and (1 <= value <= nbEnumerators), where nbEnumerators is the number of Enumberators declared in this Enum
